chinese: 我(已经)是一名老师五年了
english: I have been a teacher for five years

chinese: 我自从2019年(已经)是一名，老师了
english: I have been a teacher since 2019

chinese: 他(已经)是一名医生15年了
english: he has been a doctor for 15 years
he has been sick for a week
they have been married for 10 years

chinese: 他们自从幼儿园(已经)是朋友，了
english: they have been friends since kindergarten

chinese: 我们自从童年(已经)是朋友了
english: we have been friends since childhood

chinese: 自从我们搬家到这个街区
english: since we moved to this neighborhood

chinese: 自从我们两个都搬家到这个街，区
english: since we both moved to this neighborhood

chinese: 我们(已经)是邻居了自从我们，两个都搬家到这个街区
english: we have been neighbors since we both moved to this neighborhood
I have been to that place

chinese: 我(还没有)去过那个地方
english: I haven't been to that place

chinese: 我从来没有去过那个地方
english: I have never been to that place
I have been to that place

chinese: 我(已经)去过中国的长城
english: I have been to the Great Wall of China

chinese: 我从来没有去过中国的长城
english: I have never been to the Great Wall of China

chinese: 我(已经)去过迪士尼乐园
我(已经)去过在加州的迪士尼，乐园
english: I have been to Disneyland in California

chinese: 我从来没有去过在加州的迪士，尼乐园
english: I have never been to Disneyland in California
I have been to Japan twice
I have never been to Japan

chinese: 我从来没有去过加拿大
english: I have never been to Canada

chinese: 你从来没有去过加拿大
english: you have never been to Canada

chinese: 你从来没有去过加拿大吗？
english: have you never been to Canada?

chinese: 你以前从来没有去过加拿大，吗？
english: have you never been to Canada before?

chinese: 你以前曾经去过加拿大吗？
english: have you ever been to Canada before?
have you ever been to Canada?
have you ever been to that store?

chinese: 你曾经去过那家餐厅吗？
english: have you ever been to that restaurant?

chinese: 你曾经参加过一个现场的音乐，会吗？
english: have you ever attended a live concert?

chinese: 你曾经丢过你的钱包吗？
english: have you ever lost your wallet?

chinese: 你曾经见过一个彩虹吗？
english: have you ever seen a rainbow?
have you ever made a snowman?
have you ever been to Canada?
